segments.text: Hi , do you know what ’ s for dinner ? I ’ m starving .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We ’ re on our own tonight , dad ’ s taking mom out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Out ? What do you mean out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know on a date , they are going to dinner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , they said they ’ re reviving the old tradition .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean this is going to be a regular thing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s right , once a week . Do you want to order some pizza ?
segments.speaker: S2
